block.p: TISCHFELD--Gerald. The entire AHRC Nassau family mourns the passing of our dear friend and business associate Gerald Tischfeld. We will miss this wonderful man whom we've worked so closely with all these years. Our thoughts and prayers are with the Tischfeld family. Michael Mascari, Executive Director, AHRC Tom Rosicki, President, AHRC Board of Directors Board of Directors, AHRC Nassau
